page.title: 20CREDITS AND ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS
page.content: THE WORK ON THIS AREA OF THE DOMESDAY} PROJECT SURVEY HAS BEEN CARRIED OUT BY THE STAFF,PUPILS AND FRIENDS OF SUGAR} HILL PRIMARY SCHOOL,NEWTON AYCLIFFE. THE WORK HAS BEEN CO-ORDINATED AND EDITED BY THE HEADTEACHER{HARRY WILLS -------------------------------------- {CONTRIBUTIONS:}MADE BY SARAH HIND, SARAH PROWTING,CLARE WALTON,VANESSA O'BRIEN,LOUISE SOWERBY Mrs ERRINGTON,Rev.PROWTING,HARRY WILLS FRANK RIDLEY,JANET BALMER,DOROTHY GRICE,SUSAN CHEW,SHEILA FINN,HARRY BILTON,JACK DOBSON AND DAVID TAYLOR. -------------------------------------- THE EDITOR WISHES TO THANK ALL CONTRIBUTORS,FRANK RIDLEY FOR THE PHOTOGRAPHY,TEACHERS,PUPILS AND FARMERS FOR THEIR WORK ON THE SURVEY AND MARK SCHOFIELD AND MARGARET WILLS FOR ENTERING THE INFORMATION INTO THE COMPUTER.
